attributes.action: take some of the BNP's policies into account for some of them are much better than yours from a recent pol
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the BNP are not a racist party and if they were there would be no such thing as bnp. some of their policies are much much better and clearer than labours or conservative in fact. and those policies are what people want to be honest

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
